item.title: Grateful Dead’s Jerry Garcia Was Proof That Leadership Might Not Always Be Something You Choose
item.description: Even if you don’t sign up for the position, you still might have to take the leadership seat.

item.title: Mergers and Acquisitions Fail at the Top and in the Middle. Here’s Why Managers Determine the Fate of a Deal
item.description: Good managers and HR teams should help employees feel informed, respected, and safe during a merger.

item.title: This Data Reveals a Surprising Truth About the Super Bowl’s Impact on Local Businesses
item.description: The NFL boasts that the Super Bowl and new stadiums bring billions in economic benefits. The reality for local business is a mixed bag.

item.description: The evidence keeps piling up, yet companies are riding and dying with the Same Old SaaS.

item.description: Five of my favorite Steve Jobs perspectives.
